tagline: A magical woodland where disabilities aren't a barrier
subtagline: Welcoming individuals and groups from all walks of life to reconnect with nature and nurture wellbeing.
what_is:
Olga’s Wood has been thoughtfully adapted into a wheelchair-accessible woodland, welcoming individuals and groups from all walks of life to reconnect with nature and nurture their wellbeing.

We are deeply proud to offer a truly inclusive space. One where everyone is invited to experience the healing power of nature.
why:
Olga’s Wood was created to honour and continue the legacy of Olga’s deep dedication to healing people.

Blending the natural, holistic magic of the woodland with the enduring spirit of Olga herself, this sacred space offers a truly unique and transformative environment. One that nurtures, uplifts, and carries forward her life’s purpose.
champions_intro:
Olga’s Wood has grown into a place of peace, healing, and connection — and that wouldn’t have happened without a wonderful community of supporters by our side.

This page is our heartfelt shout-out to the friends, partners, funders, volunteers, creatives, and doers who helped bring the vision to life. Whether you gave your time, shared your skills, donated resources, or simply cheered us on — you’ve made a lasting difference, and we’re incredibly grateful.

Thank you for being part of this journey. Olga’s Wood is better because of you.
